events.title: Lightning Network Workshop
events.description: Hands-on workshop exploring Lightning Network channels, routing, and payment flows. Bring your laptop and learn to set up your own Lightning node.

schedule.title: Introduction and Setup
schedule.description: Welcome and introduction to the workshop. Get your development environment set up.

schedule.title: Lightning Network Fundamentals
schedule.description: Learn the core concepts of Lightning Network including payment channels, routing, and network architecture.

schedule.title: Hands-on Lab
schedule.description: Practical workshop session. Set up your own Lightning node on testnet and make your first Lightning payments.

schedule.title: Q&A and Networking
schedule.description: Open discussion, questions, and networking with fellow builders.

sections.title: What You'll Learn
sections.body: This workshop covers the fundamentals of Lightning Network operations, including channel management, routing strategies, and practical payment applications. Participants will set up a testnet node and make their first Lightning payments.

sections.title: Prerequisites
sections.body: Basic understanding of Bitcoin recommended. Laptop with Docker installed preferred but not required.

meta.title: Lightning Network Workshop | Builder Vancouver
meta.description: Hands-on Lightning Network workshop. Learn to set up nodes, manage channels, and make payments.
